::: {#custom-css .style}
<style>
.image-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(250px, 1fr));
  gap: 15px;
  padding: 15px;
}
.image-grid img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 200px; /* Adjust the height as needed */
  object-fit: cover;
  border-radius: 5px; /* Optional: for rounded corners */
}
</style>
:::

</div>
